name: Project R (DEMO)
description:
Action role-play game set in an apocalyptic future where robots fight among themselves, some want to annihilate humanity and others want to defend it. The robots and enemies are generated in a progressive and automatic way, meaning you never know what you will be up against and each part will be unique. NOW ON KICKSTARTER, HELP US!:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1575774543/project-r?ref=project_build

Juego RPG de Acción, en un futuro apocalíptico donde los robots luchan entre sí, unos para aniquilar a la humanidad y otros para defenderla. Las salas y enemigos se generan de forma procedural, haciendo que nunca sepas a que te vas a enfrentar y cada partida sea única. AHORA EN KICKSTARTER, ¡AYÚDANOS!:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1575774543/project-r?ref=project_build

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/Tree-Games-Studios-107288332003788

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/treegamesstudi
